config - package config
 
Config - Class in config
This class defines static properties for the game such as number of armies according to the number of players.
Config() - Constructor for class config.Config
 
CONFIG_ARMIES_FIVE_PLAYER - Static variable in class config.Config
The CONFIG_ARMIES_FIVE_PLAYER Constant assigns 25 armies to 5 player in the game.
CONFIG_ARMIES_FOUR_PLAYER - Static variable in class config.Config
The CONFIG_ARMIES_FOUR_PLAYER Constant assigns 30 armies to 4 player in the game.
CONFIG_ARMIES_SIX_PLAYER - Static variable in class config.Config
The CONFIG_ARMIES_SIX_PLAYER Constant assigns 20 armies to 6 player in the game.
CONFIG_ARMIES_THREE_PLAYER - Static variable in class config.Config
The CONFIG_ARMIES_THREE_PLAYER Constant assigns 35 armies to 3 player in the game.
CONFIG_ARMIES_TWO_PLAYER - Static variable in class config.Config
The CONFIG_ARMIES_TWO_PLAYER Constant assigns 40 armies to 2 player in the game.
